<title level="1" right="Hazard 8" pfs="">[Wrathful Dinosaur](/Hazards.aspx?ID=209)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 59</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

This figurine of a charging triceratops was crafted from the dinosaur's femur and contains its spirit.

---

**Stealth**
DC 28 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 24 [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) (expert) to banish the dinosaur's spirit with a primal incantation, DC 28 [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) to scare it off with a frightening display, or DC 26 [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) (expert) to calm the spirit

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Triceratops Trample** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Trigger** A living creature approaches within 10 feet of the figurine; **Effect** A spectral triceratops appears around the figurine and charges toward the triggering creature, affecting a line 30 feet long. Creatures in this area take 4d10+22 bludgeoning damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

---
**Reset**
1 day
